alternative_parents.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a post-transition metal.
alternative_parents.name: Post-transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic salts containing a lithium ion.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic lithium salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic salts containing a cobalt ion.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic cobalt salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing a nickel atom.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic nickel compounds

class.description: Inorganic compounds belonging either to the post-transition metal hydrides, post-transition metal nitrides, post-transition metal oxides, or the post-transition metal sulfides.
class.name: Post-transition metal organides

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as post-transition metal oxides. These are inorganic compounds containing an oxygen atom of an oxidation state of -2, in which the heaviest atom bonded to the oxygen is a post-transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds containing an oxygen atom of an oxidation state of -2, in which the heaviest atom bonded to the oxygen is a post-transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Post-transition metal oxides

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds containing an oxygen atom of an oxidation state of -2, in which the heaviest atom bonded to the oxygen is a post-transition metal.
subclass.name: Post-transition metal oxides

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
